regen.absent_element: halt sequence when closure device changes to open without operator's command after being previously closed
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the opening or closing sequence if the status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to open without an operator-initiated command.

regen.absent_element: halt sequence when the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator's command
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the opening or closing sequence if the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator-initiated command, after being previously closed at the current entrance.

regen.absent_element: the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator's command
regen.new_specification: The system shall halt the sequence if the status of a closure device changes to open without an operator-initiated command, after being previously closed at the current entrance.

label: The status of a closure device, which was previously closed at the current entrance, changes to unknown or open, without an operator-initiated command.
